languages.text: {n}Ризза {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RizzaRedeemed}покорно встает на колени{/d} и решительно смотрит в глаза Инцендии.{/n} "Я сознаюсь в своих преступлениях. Я впустила в свою душу скверну ереси и отвергла свет Императора. Я готова принять свою участь, но молю проявить снисхождение к команде моего пустотного корабля. Лишь я запятнана — они ничего не знали о моем предательстве".

{n}Ryzza {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RizzaRedeemed}kneels obediently{/d} and looks into Incendia's eyes with resolve.{/n} "I confess to my crimes. I let the corruption of heresy into my soul and rejected the light of the Emperor. I will accept my fate, but I'm begging you to be lenient toward the crew of my voidship. Only I am tainted. They knew nothing of my treachery."
languages.original_text: {n}Ризза {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RizzaRedeemed}покорно встает на колени{/d} и решительно смотрит в глаза Инцендии.{/n} "Я сознаюсь в своих преступлениях. Лишь я запятнана — они ничего не знали о моем предательстве".

languages.text: {n}莱萨{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RizzaRedeemed}顺从地跪在地上{/d}，凝视着因森蒂娅的双眼，目光中充满了决心。{/n}“我为我的罪行忏悔。我让异端邪说腐蚀了我的灵魂，拒绝了帝皇的明光。我愿意接受我的命运，但我恳求您，请对我虚空舰上的船员手下留情。只有我一个人遭到了玷污，他们对我的背叛一无所知。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RizzaRedeemed}kneels obediently{/d} and looks into Incendia's eyes with resolve.{/n} "I confess to my crimes. I let the corruption of heresy into my soul and rejected the light of the Emperor. I will accept my fate, but I'm begging you to be lenient toward the crew of my voidship. Only I am tainted. They knew nothing of my treachery."

traits.locale_text: {n}莱萨顺从地跪在地上，凝视着因森蒂娅的双眼，目光中充满了决心。{/n}“我为我的罪行忏悔。我让异端邪说腐蚀了我的灵魂，拒绝了帝皇的明光。我愿意接受我的命运，但我恳求您，请对我虚空舰上的船员手下留情。只有我一个人遭到了玷污，他们对我的背叛一无所知。”
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}リザは{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RizzaRedeemed}従順に跪き{/d}、覚悟を決めた表情でインセンディアの目をじっと見つめた。{/n}「罪を認めます。私は異端の堕落を魂に宿らせ、皇帝の光を拒みました。己の運命を受け入れるが、ヴォイドシップの仲間だけは大目に見てやってください。罪に染まっているのは私だけだ。あいつらは私の裏切りについては何も知らない」
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RizzaRedeemed}kneels obediently{/d} and looks into Incendia's eyes with resolve.{/n} "I confess to my crimes. I let the corruption of heresy into my soul and rejected the light of the Emperor. I will accept my fate, but I'm begging you to be lenient toward the crew of my voidship. Only I am tainted. They knew nothing of my treachery."

traits.locale_text: {n}リザは{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RizzaRedeemed}従順に跪き{/d}、覚悟を決めた表情でインセンディアの目をじっと見つめた。{/n}「罪を認めます。私は異端の堕落を魂に宿らせ、皇帝の光を拒みました。己の運命を受け入れるが、ヴォイドシップの仲間だけは大目に見てやってください。罪に染まっているのは私だけだ。あいつらは私の裏切りについては何も知らない」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}Ryzza {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RizzaRedeemed}se arrodilla obedientemente{/d} y mira a los ojos de Incendia con determinación.{/n} «Confieso mis crímenes. Dejé que la corrupción de la herejía entrara en mi alma y rechacé la luz del Emperador. Aceptaré mi destino, pero le ruego que sea indulgente con la tripulación de mi nave del vacío. Solo yo estoy corrompida. Ellos no sabían nada sobre mi traición».
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RizzaRedeemed}kneels obediently{/d} and looks into Incendia's eyes with resolve.{/n} "I confess to my crimes. I let the corruption of heresy into my soul and rejected the light of the Emperor. I will accept my fate, but I'm begging you to be lenient toward the crew of my voidship. Only I am tainted. They knew nothing of my treachery."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza se arrodilla obedientemente y mira a los ojos de Incendia con determinación.{/n} «Confieso mis crímenes. Dejé que la corrupción de la herejía entrara en mi alma y rechacé la luz del Emperador. Aceptaré mi destino, pero le ruego que sea indulgente con la tripulación de mi nave del vacío. Solo yo estoy corrompida. Ellos no sabían nada sobre mi traición».
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}Ryzza {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RizzaRedeemed}kniet sich gehorsam nieder{/d} und blickt Incendia mit entschlossenen Augen an.{/n} "Ich gestehe meine Verbrechen. Ich habe die Verderbnis der Ketzerei in meine Seele gelassen und das Licht des Imperators zurückgewiesen. Ich werde mein Schicksal akzeptieren, doch ich flehe Euch an, zeigt Gnade gegenüber der Crew meines Raumschiffs. Nur ich bin verdorben. Sie wussten nichts von meinem Verrat."
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RizzaRedeemed}kneels obediently{/d} and looks into Incendia's eyes with resolve.{/n} "I confess to my crimes. I let the corruption of heresy into my soul and rejected the light of the Emperor. I will accept my fate, but I'm begging you to be lenient toward the crew of my voidship. Only I am tainted. They knew nothing of my treachery."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza kniet sich gehorsam nieder und blickt Incendia mit entschlossenen Augen an.{/n} "Ich gestehe meine Verbrechen. Ich habe die Verderbnis der Ketzerei in meine Seele gelassen und das Licht des Imperators zurückgewiesen. Ich werde mein Schicksal akzeptieren, doch ich flehe Euch an, zeigt Gnade gegenüber der Crew meines Raumschiffs. Nur ich bin verdorben. Sie wussten nichts von meinem Verrat."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}Ryzza {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RizzaRedeemed}s'agenouille docilement{/d} et fixe Incendia d'un regard résolu.{/n} « J'avoue mes crimes. J'ai laissé la corruption de l'hérésie s'insinuer dans mon âme et j'ai rejeté la lumière de l'Empereur. J'accepte mon destin, mais je vous supplie de faire preuve de clémence envers l'équipage de mon vaisseau. Je suis la seule à avoir été corrompue, eux ne savaient rien de ma trahison. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RizzaRedeemed}kneels obediently{/d} and looks into Incendia's eyes with resolve.{/n} "I confess to my crimes. I let the corruption of heresy into my soul and rejected the light of the Emperor. I will accept my fate, but I'm begging you to be lenient toward the crew of my voidship. Only I am tainted. They knew nothing of my treachery."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza s'agenouille docilement et fixe Incendia d'un regard résolu.{/n} « J'avoue mes crimes. J'ai laissé la corruption de l'hérésie s'insinuer dans mon âme et j'ai rejeté la lumière de l'Empereur. J'accepte mon destin, mais je vous supplie de faire preuve de clémence envers l'équipage de mon vaisseau. Je suis la seule à avoir été corrompue, eux ne savent rien de ma trahison. »
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}Ryzza, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RizzaRedeemed}itaatkâr bir şekilde diz çöküp{/d} kararlılıkla İncendia'nın gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Suçlarımı itiraf ediyorum. Kâfirliğin yozlaşmasının ruhuma yayılmasına izin verdim ve İmparator'un ışığını reddettim. Kaderimi kabul ediyorum ancak size yalvarıyorum, lütfen uçsuz gemimdeki mürettebatıma karşı hoşgörülü olun. Tek kirlenen benim. Onlar ihanetimden bihaberler."
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RizzaRedeemed}kneels obediently{/d} and looks into Incendia's eyes with resolve.{/n} "I confess to my crimes. I let the corruption of heresy into my soul and rejected the light of the Emperor. I will accept my fate, but I'm begging you to be lenient toward the crew of my voidship. Only I am tainted. They knew nothing of my treachery."

Kâfirliğin yozlaşmasının ruhuma yayılmasına izin verdim ve İmparator'un ışığını reddettim. Kaderimi kabul ediyorum ancak size yalvarıyorum, lütfen uçsuz gemimdeki mürettebatıma karşı hoşgörülü olun. Tek kirlenen benim. Onlar ihanetimden bihaberler."
